execution_plan.description: Retrieve the 10 most recently created products from the main store ordered by created_at descending.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS product_id, name AS product_name, sku, price, is_active, created_at, category_id FROM products ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve the 10 most recently created items from the alternate store ordered by created_on descending.
execution_plan.query: SELECT code AS item_code, title AS item_title, amount_in_cents, active, created_on, group_ref FROM items ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 10;
